rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {M3001}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {OCC2011, OCC2020}

description: Students enrolled in the Bachelor of Occupational Therapy (Honours) must complete fieldwork placements to satisfy the professional requirements that a sufficient period of supervised practice be completed prior to graduation and application for registration issued by the Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency. This 6 week fieldwork placement unit plays an important part in consolidating student application of professional knowledge, attitudes and skills.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
